name: Proactive Scene
description: Inspired by Scene & Sequel and the Snowflake Method

attributes.name: Goal
attributes.description: What does the character want or need to achieve in this scene?

attributes.name: Conflict
attributes.description: What stops (or could stop) the character from achieving their goal in this scene?

attributes.name: Setback
attributes.description: What takes away the agency or power of the character in this scene?
